original_title: Sri Lanka bonds open steady, rupee 310.00/312.00 to dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka bonds were steady at open, dealers said while the spot US dollar opened at 310.00/312.00 rupees.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted at 14.50/15.00 percent steady from14.50/60 percent from the previous close.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 closed at 14.50/15.00 percent steady from 15.00/40 percent from opening.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 closed at 15.00/50 percent steady from 15.25/15.50 percent from opening. (Colombo/ July 07/2023)
